name: CIAztecCodeDescriptor
desc: A concrete subclass of CIBarcodeDescriptor that represents an Aztec code symbol.

items.name: init?(payload: Data, isCompact: Bool, layerCount: Int, dataCodewordCount: Int)
items.desc: Initializes a descriptor that can be used as input to the CIBarcodeGenerator filter.

items.name: var errorCorrectedPayload: Data
items.desc: The error-corrected payload containing the data encoded in the Aztec code.

items.name: var isCompact: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value telling if the Aztec code is compact.

items.name: var layerCount: Int
items.desc: The number of layers embedded in the Aztec code.

items.name: var dataCodewordCount: Int
items.desc: The number of data codewords in the Aztec code.
